pullRequest.title: Fixing bug where legacy hibernate 5 entity manager store recycles the…
pullRequest.bodyText:
… entity manager
Description
Fixes ancient bug in Hibernate 5 entity manager store where it recycles the entity manager.
Motivation and Context
The store is busted without this fix.
How Has This Been Tested?
Tested in Elide 5 with tests for Elide async which caught this bug.
License
I confirm that this contribution is made under an Apache 2.0 license and that I have the authority necessary to make this contribution on behalf of its copyright owner.

commit.message: Fixing bug where legacy hibernate 5 entity manager store recycles the entity manager
